briefTitle: Molecular Analysis of the Sloane Project
officialTitle: Molecular Analysis of Screen Detected Non-invasive Breast Cancer and Atypical Breast Hyperplasias Identified by the Sloane Project
conditions: DCIS, LCIS, Atypical Ductal Hyperplasia, Atypical Lobular Hyperplasia
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* DCIS (Ductal Carcinoma in situ)
* LCIS (Lobular Carcinoma in situ)
* Atypical hyperplasias
